CustomField.formula: /* only specify holidays which fall on business days */ IF(and(Current_EOQ__c > Date(2025,2,17), date(2025,2,17) > today()),1, 0) +IF(and(Current_EOQ__c > Date(2025,5,26), date(2025,5,26) > today()),1, 0) +IF(and(Current_EOQ__c > Date(2025,6,19), date(2025,6,19) > today()),1, 0) +IF(and(Current_EOQ__c> Date(2025,7,4), date(2025,7,4) > today()),1, 0) +IF(and(Current_EOQ__c> Date(2025,9,1), date(2025,9,1) > today()),1, 0) +IF(and(Current_EOQ__c> Date(2025,11,27), date(2025,11,27) > today()),1, 0) +IF(and(Current_EOQ__c > Date(2025,11,28), date(2025,11,28) > today()),1, 0) +IF(and(Current_EOQ__c> Date(2025,12,22), date(2025,12,22) > today()),1, 0) +IF(and(Current_EOQ__c> Date(2025,12,23), date(2025,12,23) > today()),1, 0) +IF(and(Current_EOQ__c> Date(2025,12,24), date(2025,12,24) > today()),1, 0) +IF(and(Current_EOQ__c> Date(2025,12,25), date(2025,12,25) > today()),1, 0) +IF(and(Current_EOQ__c > Date(2025,12,26), date(2025,12,26) > today()),1, 0) +IF(and(Current_EOQ__c> Date(2026,1,1), date(2026,1,1) > today()),1, 0) +IF(and(Current_EOQ__c> Date(2026,1,19), date(2026,1,19) > today()),1, 0)
CustomField.label: Holidays To EOQ
